name: Donkey Kong: The 3D Remake
description:
This year is Nintendo's 40th Anniversary and to celebrate it, We have the 3D remake to the original arcade game Donkey Kong from 1981 like never before. Even though you can't climb the ladders while using the hammer but in this remake, you now can. Like always, control Jumpman to the top to rescue Pauline from the devious gorilla Donkey Kong just like in the 80s. It's a blast from the past!

Use Alt+F4 to quit.
